root.name: text()
root.description: Displays the information specified in the data parameter on the screen in the position specified by the x and y parameters and the optional z parameter. The text displays in relation to the textMode() function, which gives the option to draw to the left, right, and center of the coordinates. The width and height parameters define a finite area to display within and may only be used with string data. A font must be set with the textFont() function before text() may be called.
root.syntax: text(data, x, y) text(data, x, y, z) text(sdata, x, y, width, height) text(stringdata, x, y, z, width, height)

parameter.label: data
parameter.description: String, char, int, or float: the alphanumeric symbols to be displayed

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: int or float: x-coordinate of text

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: int or float: y-coordinate of text

parameter.label: z
parameter.description: int or float: z-coordinate of text

parameter.label: width
parameter.description: int or float: width of text box

parameter.label: height
parameter.description: int or float: height of text box
